-Fully functional on Kmeaw 3.55, with MultiMan (lateste update V.2).
-DO NOT UPDATE TO 1.01, it will no longer work. If you did update, just go to GAME DATA folder on the XMB and delete the infamous 2 file, then start the game and click "O: cancel update".

@gamerskillz this is a ps3 game. There is no ps3 emu and will probably never be 1 considering the ps2 emu is still buggy after 10 years. Get a ps3 with 3.55 fw (3.56+ will not work with this) and jailbreak it. Google knows all.

the included 3.55 patch did not work for me. use this one if it doesnt work for you too: http://www.theplaystationclub.com/downloads/

scroll down to game patches and click the infamous 2 3.55 one

Works fine with kmew3.55 and multiman 2.00.01 (external fat32 usb drive), just copy the "eboot.bin" file from the crack folder over the one in the "\PS3_GAME\USRDIR" folder, do not use the updates because they're designed for 3.56+.

Detailed Solution How to get it To WoRk???

things you need=>
-3.55 custom firmware
-rogero manage
-comgenie awesome file manager

-put the downloaded game into external hard drive.(i am not using the FTP method).
-hard drive should be FAT32 (i assume you know how to FAT32 your hard drive).
-attach hard drive into usb port of PS3 and in comgenie awesome file manager go into advance mode , then copy from usbxxxx file with code like BLESxxxxxx to hdd000.

this is how i got mine working. ask me if i missed the something in detail.
